sourcesContent:
Список дел

  • {{item.description}}
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'] }) export class AppComponent { title = 'todoList'; filter: 'all' | 'active' | 'done' = 'all'; allItems = [ { description: 'Поесть', done: true }, { description: 'Поспать', done: false }, { description: 'Работать', done: false }, { description: 'Отдыхать', done: false }, ]; get items() { if (this.filter === 'all') { return this.allItems; } return this.allItems.filter(item => this.filter === 'done' ? item.done : !item.done); } addItem(description: string) { this.allItems.unshift({ description, done: false }); } }
